title: How I Search for Profitable KDP Niches in 2026
description:

Most people search for KDP niches the wrong way - and waste months on books that will never be profitable. In this video, I'm showing you my exact process for finding KDP niches that actually make money in 2026.

If you're tired of making books that don't sell or burning money on ads that don't convert, this video will save you time and money.
